title: KareBear
description: WINNER @ ElleHacks 2025. AI Plushie helping children to navigate their emotions using image  and speech detection.

title: SkipTheLine
description: Enqueues you to rides instead of waiting in line. Creates optimized schedule based on reduced waiting times.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: You're looking at it! Built with Vite and React, structured with JavaScript code, then finally beautifully designed using HTML and CSS.

title: MealMate
description: Self-orienting spoon for those with limited hand mobility. Modelled to oppose the orientation data of spoon head. Data recieved from Raspberry Pi and worked with Python.

title: X-rAI
description: Built a Python-based ML model to detect conditions from X-rays with 90%+ accuracy. Implemented image preprocessing, model training, and a user-friendly interface for instant results.
